title: Two teens charged with murder in shooting death of 15-year-old
content:
CHARLOTTE, NC (WBTV) -
Two teens were arrested Wednesday in connection to a November shooting that killed a 15-year-old in east Charlotte.
Davione Mackey, 17, and David Burns, 16, are both charged with murder in the death of Zavier Ellis.
Ellis was shot on November 13, on the 8000 block of Sherington Way at 2:41 p.m. The teen was then taken to Carolinas Medical Center where he passed away two days later.
People who knew Ellis said he was a student at Independence High School.
Detectives said information acquired during the investigation led them to naming Mackey and Burns as suspects, but did not release further information.
Anyone with information about this shooting is asked to call 704-432-TIPS and speak directly to a Homicide Unit Detective. You can also call Crime Stoppers at 704-334-1600.
